channel.title: Help Please
channel.description:
I'm using Delta.
1. How can I make it so more than 1 player can attack a NPC ? Tell me which file to go and what to search please.
2. How can I make it so when I mine, it doesn't stop mining after I got 1 ore in enventory ?

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Mod Brandon12111:

I’ve told you already man, For a NPC to be able to be attacked by more than one person IT HAS TO BE IN A MULTI COMBAT AREA

I know but I want to know which file to I need to do it.

Read full topic
